content: We are working on the HL7 OUL messages mapping from V2 to FHIR. We mapped SAC (Specimen Container Detail) to Specimen resource, where SAC.27 Additive is mapped to Specimen.container.additiveCondeableConcept. In OUL messages SAC is followed by INV segment (Inventory details). Can someone help us confirm if the INV segment contains further details of the additive in SAC or Is this some other reagent/substance details? Thank you for any assistance you can provide.
You might have better luck addressing this question on the Orders and Observations WG stream. Not sure all of their experts monitor this stream.
